profiles:
Summary Hardworking and goal-oriented candidate with experience in ESB development and SOA integration across multiple settings: proficient and skilled across Web Services principles, standards, technologies and tools; knowledgeable in IBM integration specialization – Message Broker WMB,MQ Series, BPM, Tivoli Monitoring with good exposure on complex transformations and routing ; knowledgeable in the principles of requirements gathering and preparation of technical specifications; effective working knowledge of the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) including developing functional specification and design documents (high level design & low level designs); J2EE Web services, WSDL(SOAP, UDDI) design and development and UML designing; effective technical acumen and high-order organizational and analytical skills. Summary Hardworking and goal-oriented candidate with experience in ESB development and SOA integration across multiple settings: proficient and skilled across Web Services principles, standards, technologies and tools; knowledgeable in IBM integration specialization – Message Broker WMB,MQ Series, BPM, Tivoli Monitoring with good exposure on complex transformations and routing ; knowledgeable in the principles of requirements gathering and preparation of technical specifications; effective working knowledge of the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) including developing functional specification and design documents (high level design & low level designs); J2EE Web services, WSDL(SOAP, UDDI) design and development and UML designing; effective technical acumen and high-order organizational and analytical skills. Hardworking and goal-oriented candidate with experience in ESB development and SOA integration across multiple settings: proficient and skilled across Web Services principles, standards, technologies and tools; knowledgeable in IBM integration specialization – Message Broker WMB,MQ Series, BPM, Tivoli Monitoring with good exposure on complex transformations and routing ; knowledgeable in the principles of requirements gathering and preparation of technical specifications; effective working knowledge of the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) including developing functional specification and design documents (high level design & low level designs); J2EE Web services, WSDL(SOAP, UDDI) design and development and UML designing; effective technical acumen and high-order organizational and analytical skills. Hardworking and goal-oriented candidate with experience in ESB development and SOA integration across multiple settings: proficient and skilled across Web Services principles, standards, technologies and tools; knowledgeable in IBM integration specialization – Message Broker WMB,MQ Series, BPM, Tivoli Monitoring with good exposure on complex transformations and routing ; knowledgeable in the principles of requirements gathering and preparation of technical specifications; effective working knowledge of the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) including developing functional specification and design documents (high level design & low level designs); J2EE Web services, WSDL(SOAP, UDDI) design and development and UML designing; effective technical acumen and high-order organizational and analytical skills. Experience ESB Specialist / SOA Integration Developer Logikal Consulting February 2011  – Present (4 years 7 months) Johannesburg Area, South Africa Current Project: ACSA (Airport Company South Africa), Logikal Consulting, South Africa 
 
• Acts as Websphere Integration Specialist and participates in the development of WMB, MQ, Tivoli, and BPM whilst providing support for integration environments; implements IBM Websphere Tivoli Common Reporting in the integration layer and the IBM License Metric Tool as per business requirements. 
• Facilitates repairs and monitors integration environments; prepares Daily Health Check Report for ESB/MQ environment, Weekly MQ Compliance Report and Quarterly ESB Service Report using Windows 8 and ESQL, MQ Series languages. 
• Utilizes IBM WebSphere Message Broker 7.0, IBM WebSphere MQ 7.0.1, IBM Process Designer 8.0, IBM Tivoli Monitoring 6.2.2, IBM License Metric Tool, IBM Tivoli Log File Agent 6.2.3, and SoupUI, RFHUTILs, WebSphere MQ Administrator and Oracle 10g database. 
 
 
Project: ABSA Online (AOL), Logikal Consulting, South Africa 
 
• Utilized understanding of business requirements based on system documents; designed WSDL and XSDs whilst implementing Web services in IBM Message Broker, IBM WebSphere MQ, J2EE based on business requirements; facilitated repairs and developed IBM Compute grid batch jobs whilst monitoring batch job logs. 
• Handled Windows XP OS and Java, EJB, Compute Grid languages/technologies, IBM Rational Solution for Architect, IBM Websphere Application Server, IBM WebSphere Message Broker 7.0, IBM WebSphere MQ 7.0.1, Remedy, SoupUI, RFHUTILs, WebSphere MQ Administrator and DB2 database. ESB Developer Wipro Technologies April 2010  –  February 2011  (11 months) Johannesburg, South Africa Project: SBSA-TO-Y2-TAS (Standard Bank), Wipro, South Africa 
 
• Participated in the development of WMB, MQ for the following portfolios to include Business Operations (BO), VAF (Vehicle Asset Finance), Cards, Home Loan (Hl), Credits and SAP based on the Business use cases. 
• Provided support on Message Broker/MQ related incidents. 
• Monitored MQ components such as Queue Manager, Channels, Queues and ESB components to include Configuration Manager and Broker; acted on incidents in the Message Broker/MQ and provided resolution within specified timeframes whilst facilitating 24/7 support. 
• Utilized understanding of business requirements based on system documents; facilitated message flow, message set development and unit testing whilst monitoring Message Broker components such as Broker, Configuration Manager, Execution Group, Message Flows. 
• Monitored errors in Message Broker/MQ whilst utilizing Message Flows, ESQL, WSDL; deployed BAR files through toolkit and from the command prompt whilst managing, configuring and monitoring MQ Listeners, Command Servers, Channel initiators, Trigger Monitors, MQ Log files & Dead Letter Queues and providing root cause analysis.  
• Utilized Windows XP, ESQL and MQ technologies, IBM WebSphere Message Broker 6.1, IBM WebSphere MQ 6.0, Remedy, SoupUI, RFHUTILs, WebSphere MQ Administrator and DB2 database. ESB Developer / SOA Developer Capgemini October 2006  –  March 2010  (3 years 6 months) Pune Area, India Project: PVI (Partner Vendor Interface), Capgemini, Pune 
 
• Prepared class/sequence diagrams and Usecase according to business requirements; facilitated the preparation of technical specifications and test scripts based on functional specifications. 
• Designed database and MQ structures 
• Participated in the development of IBM WebSphere Message Broker Message Flows, Mappings, MQ components and unit/integration testing.  
• Used the following technologies such as Windows XP, ESQL, Maxi Framework, MQ Series, IBM WebSphere Message Broker 6.0.2, IBM WebSphere MQ 6.0, Datastage 8.0, MKS Source Integrity 4.7.0.3424 and Oracle 10g. 
 
Project: CRS-eChamps, Capgemini, Pune 
 
• Collected information to analyze and evaluate existing systems whilst participating in the review design to check adherence to all user requirements; prepared technical specification based on functional specs and detailed flow charts and diagrams outlining systems capabilities and processes. 
• Facilitated application development using IBM WebSphere Message Broker 6.0.2, IBM WebSphere MQ 6.0, Java, JSP, Servlet, EJB; provided 24/7 production support whilst handling system integration testing with backend, unit testing & integration testing; repaired defects across Pre-SIT, SIT and UAT region whilst handling Defect Assignment activities; prepared monthly Metrics sheet and weekly WSRs. 
• Utilized Windows XP, Java, Servlets, ES Framework languages and technologies, IBM WebSphere Message Broker 6.0.2, IBM WebSphere MQ 6.0, IBM WebSphere Studio Application Developer 5.1.2, MKS Source Integrity 4.7.0.3424 technologies and Oracle 9i database. 
 
Project: EChamps TBR, Kanbay Software, Pune 
 
• Prepared technical specification and test scripts based on functional specifications; handled coding and unit/integration testing. 
• Utilized the following tools and technologies to include Windows XP, Java, Servlet, ES Framework, IBM WebSphere Studio Application Developer 5.1.2, MKS Source Integrity 4.7.0.3424 and Oracle 9i. Developer CMC Limited August 2005  –  August 2006  (1 year 1 month) Project: DB Everest Plus, TCS Limited, Bangalore 
 
• Reengineered the application and prepared technical specifications while facilitating integration testing.  
• Utilized the following systems to include Windows XP, Java, Servlet, EJB, BEA Weblogic 8.1 and Oracle 8.0. 
 
 
Project: NSR (National Skills Registry) for NSDL, Mumbai 
 
• Facilitated the development of the application using JSP, Servlet, and EJB; prepared technical specification as per business requirements and test scripts based on functional specs. 
• Performed coding and unit/integration testing; utilized the following systems such as Windows XP, Java, JSP, Servlet, EJB, BEA Weblogic 8.1, Toad 7.2, Hibernate 3.0 and Oracle 8.0. Summary Having experience in both Business and Technology domains I have a uniqie presptive on the digital revolution and its impact on the business world. 
 
Working in the Middle East I have first hand experience of how the IT industry has enabled rapid growth, uniqie business models and global collaboration.  
 
My Goal is to play a significant role in the evolution of technology by contributing to both the academic and industry arena. 
 
Specialties: Excellent understanding of technology and its role in businesses. Quickly and effectively making the link from function to feature to benefit to the business. Summary Jan Baeyens is a strong application architect. He is strong in capturing business requirements and translating business desires into solid architectures. He is quick in finding inconsistencies in designs. Therefore he is generally known as gap-analist by his colleagues. Jan has a strong sense of humor and likes playing with words.  
Jan has build a solid application development experience over the last 20 years. His experiences made him a strong believer in total quality management based on open and clear communication and solid testing of the results.
